au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=L2=20m_central_apx10mm
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value #config.att = 330 #config.wavelength = 5 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 19250 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 150 config.guide = 'ga' #config.apx = -72 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 94.6478 config.beamcenterz = 94.5575 config.drive()
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(39, 100) # Drive attenuator to 240 driveAtt(240)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(39, 0) driveBsz(252.0)
